00051   const char *usage[] = {
00052     "usage: dumplog [options] <log-dir>",
00053     "",
00054     "  options:",
00055     "    --block-summary  Display commit log block information only",
00056     "    --config=<file>  Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file",
00057     "                     is \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel",
00058     "                     install directory",
00059     "    --display-values Display values (assumes they're printable)",
00060     "    --help           Display this help text and exit",
00061     "    --verbose,-v     Display 'true' if up, 'false' otherwise",
00062     "",
00063     "  This program dumps the given log's metadata.",
00064     "",
00065     (const char *)0
00066   };

00077 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00078   string cfgfile = "";
00079   string log_dir;
00080   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00081   bool verbose = false;
00082   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr;
00083   DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client;
00084   CommitLogReader *log_reader;
00085   bool block_summary = false;
00086   bool display_values = false;
00087 
00088   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00089   ReactorFactory::initialize((uint16_t)System::get_processor_count());
00090 
00091   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00092     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--block-summary"))
00093       block_summary = true;
00094     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00095       cfgfile = &argv[i][9];
00096     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--display-values"))
00097       display_values = true;
00098     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00099       verbose = true;
00100     else if (log_dir == "")
00101       log_dir = argv[i];
00102     else
00103       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00104   }
00105 
00106   if (log_dir == "")
00107       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00108 
00109   if (cfgfile == "")
00110     cfgfile = System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00111 
00112   props_ptr = new Properties(cfgfile);
00113 
00114   conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager();
00115 
00119   {
00120     const char *loghost = props_ptr->get("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host", 0);
00121     uint16_t logport    = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Port", 0);
00122     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00123     if (loghost != 0) {
00124       InetAddr::initialize(&addr, loghost, logport);
00125       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, addr, 600);
00126     }
00127     else {
00128       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, props_ptr);
00129     }
00130 
00131     if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00132       HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00133       exit(1);
00134     }
00135   }
00136 
00137   log_reader = new CommitLogReader(dfs_client, log_dir);
00138 
00139   if (block_summary) {
00140     printf("LOG %s\n", log_dir.c_str());
00141     display_log_block_summary(dfs_client, "", log_reader);
00142   }
00143   else
00144     display_log(dfs_client, "", log_reader, display_values);
00145 
00146   delete log_reader;
00147 
00148   return 0;
00149 }

00153   void display_log(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, String prefix, CommitLogReader *log_reader, bool display_values) {
00154     BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00155     const uint8_t *base;
00156     size_t len;
00157     const uint8_t *ptr, *end;
00158     TableIdentifier table_id;
00159     ByteString bs;
00160     Key key;
00161     String value;
00162     uint32_t blockno=0;
00163 
00164     while (log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
00165 
00166       HT_EXPECT(header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00167 
00168       ptr = base;
00169       end = base + len;
00170 
00171       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00172 
00173       while (ptr < end) {
00174 
00175         // extract the key
00176         bs.ptr = ptr;
00177         key.load(bs);
00178         cout << key;
00179         bs.next();
00180 
00181         if (display_values) {
00182           const uint8_t *vptr;
00183           size_t slen = bs.decode_length(&vptr);
00184           cout << " value='" << std::string((char *)vptr, slen) << "'";
00185         }
00186 
00187         //cout << " bno=" << blockno << endl;
00188         cout << endl;
00189 
00190         // skip value
00191         bs.next();
00192 
00193         ptr = bs.ptr;
00194         if (ptr > end)
00195           HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
00196 
00197       }
00198       blockno++;
00199     }
00200   }

00204   void display_log_block_summary(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, String prefix, CommitLogReader *log_reader) {
00205     CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00206     BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00207 
00208     while (log_reader->next_raw_block(&binfo, &header)) {
00209 
00210       HT_EXPECT(header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00211 
00212       printf("%sDATA frag=\"%s\" ts=%llu start=%09llu end=%09llu ",
00213              prefix.c_str(), binfo.file_fragment, 
00214              (long long unsigned int)header.get_timestamp(),
00215              (long long unsigned int)binfo.start_offset,
00216              (long long unsigned int)binfo.end_offset);
00217 
00218       if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00219         printf("ztype=\"%s\" zlen=%u len=%u\n",
00220                BlockCompressionCodec::get_compressor_name(header.get_compression_type()),
00221                header.get_data_zlength(), header.get_data_length());
00222       }
00223       else
00224         printf("%serror = \"%s\"\n", prefix.c_str(), Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00225     }
00226   }
